TextView.android:text: Tabernacle Baptist Church of Burlington, New Jersey ‘s mission is to be a Christ-centered village dedicated to the development of church and community through worship, service, sharing, teaching and preaching.

1. Engaging Enviroment: 

We seek to provide worship environments that are engaging and facilitate a spiritual experience for ALL who attend. 

2. God is a God of Excellence 

We believe God is a God of excellence. Therefore, we offer ministries that edify the church and community with quality and excellence. 
 
3. Spiritual Growth 
We stand on the truth of God’s word and we adjust our actions according to our belief in scripture. Spiritual growth through the teaching and studying of God’s word is a high priority. 

4. Spiritual Gifts

We strongly believe that God has given spiritual gifts to individuals in the Body of Christ. We seek to cultivate those gifts so that all will have the opportunity to serve.


5. Spiritual Commitment

We take missions seriously. Our partnerships and local efforts seek to contribute to spreading God’s love nationally and internationally. We also commit to sharing the gospel extensively.


6. Family Members

We believe that every person is a member of the family so we treat everyone with Christian love, respect, and honor.


7. Youth

We value our YOUTH. Tabernacle’s goal is to ensure that every young person meets Christ. In addition, we offer ministries to build our youth educationally, spiritually, and socially.


8. Forward Thinking

We are a forward-thinking church; willing to step out on faith to become what God intends for us to be.
